mapper.sql: task_id as taskId, start_time as startTime, end_time as endTime, success_count as successCount, failed_count as failedCount, offline_count as offlineCount, total_count as totalCount
mapper.select: select a.task_id as taskId, a.start_time as startTime, a.end_time as endTime, a.success_count as successCount, a.failed_count as failedCount, a.offline_count as offlineCount, a.total_count as totalCount from statistics a,( select task_id,max(start_time) startTime from statistics where task_id in (select distinct(id) from task) group by task_id) b where a.task_id = b.task_id and a.start_time = b.startTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO statistics (task_id, start_time, end_time, success_count, failed_count, offline_count, total_count) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{successCount}, #{failedCount}, #{offlineCount}, #{totalCount});

from statistics where task_id=#{taskId} order by start_time desc
